visibility: To start select visible algorithms by clicking the button in the upper right corner or right clicking on empty space in main view.
order: You can change the algorithms order by dragging them or by right clicking their cards and choosing move option.
dane: You can change the sorting data using either 'Custom Data' or 'Example Data' button at the top in the middle of the screen.
theme: You can switch between dark and light theme by clicking the button in the top left corner.
controls: Control the algorithms steps and speed using controls at the bottom of the screen.
info: By pressing the 'i' button in the upper-right corner of the algorithm card, you can learn about its complexity and stability, view the code, or, in the case of some algorithms, get additional information about them.
